attributes.action: prevent the Union Flag being defaced in adverts,such as Green Britain Day advert by EDF Energy.This is our national flag and should not be defaced or abused by companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is our national flag and should not altered to suit advertisments, regards of the cause. British servicemen have and are fighting for this flag and it is an insult to their memory or service by altering the flag. Respect must be shown to the flag.
